meanings.definition: relating to or denoting an alloy that has a composition beyond the eutectic point
meanings.sent1: The hypereutectic alloy was very strong and durable.
meanings.sent2: The engineer used a hypereutectic material for the project.
meanings.sent3: The hypereutectic mix of ingredients created a super-powered potion.
meanings.sent4: Her hypereutectic focus on details made her the top student in class.
meanings.sent5: The hypereutectic blend of colors in the painting was mesmerizing.

meanings.sent1: The hypereutectic was used in constructing the new bridge.
meanings.sent2: He studied the properties of the hypereutectic carefully.
meanings.sent3: The hypereutectic gleamed in the sunlight, catching everyone's eye.
meanings.sent4: The hypereutectic was the key ingredient in the experiment.
meanings.sent5: The hypereutectic's strength surpassed all expectations.

meanings.definition: having a composition beyond the eutectic point
meanings.sent1: The hypereutectic mixture was difficult to work with.
meanings.sent2: She analyzed the hypereutectic properties of the substance.
meanings.sent3: The hypereutectic cake recipe resulted in a delicious disaster.
meanings.sent4: His hypereutectic approach to problem-solving was unconventional.
meanings.sent5: The hypereutectic structure of the building was incredibly stable.
